niffler.title: Niffler
niffler.about.get-notified.description: a Twitter bot that helps you to stay up to date with releases of popular frontend frameworks & libraries!
niffler.about.contributors.description1: Want to start contributing to open source with Angular?
niffler.about.contributors.description2: Leave your mark and join the growing team of contributors!
niffler.about.contributors.description3: Get started by having a look on
niffler.features.title: Features
niffler.features.angular-cli: A command line interface for Angular
niffler.features.ngrx: One way data flow powered by RxJS Observables
niffler.features.rxjs: Reactive programming with async collections using Observables
niffler.features.bootstrap: Responsive layout from battle tested, world most famous UI library
niffler.features.typescript: Superior developer experience, code completion, refactoring and less bugs
niffler.features.fontawesome: Easy to use vector icons and social logos
niffler.features.themes: Flexible theming support for provided and custom components
niffler.features.themes.title: Themes
niffler.features.lazyloading: Faster startup time with lazy loaded feature modules
niffler.features.lazyloading.title: Lazy loading
niffler.features.cypress: Cypress is a next generation front end testing tool built for the modern web.
niffler.settings.title: Settings
